alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 12:02PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wayne and northeastern Holmes Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1202 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millersburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millersburg, Berlin, Shreve, Holmesville, Mount Eaton, Winesburg, Apple Creek, Fredericksburg and Mount Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
